title: Spider!
brief_description: Seven delightful animated musical tales about a little boy and his unusual friend, a cheeky spider. 1. Spider in the bath. 2. Just a spider. 3. In my tent. 4. Monkey business. 5. Hedgehog hunt. 6. The spider’s song. 7. Little Miss M. When the boy first meets the spider in the bath, he tries to swirl him down the plughole, but after many adventures together, he and the spider become firm friends.
